title: President Donald J. Trump Is Taking Action to Stop Youth Opioid Abuse â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
June 7, 2018
My Administration is committed to fighting the drug epidemic and helping get treatment for those in need.
						President Donald J. Trump					CAMPAIGN TO STOP YOUTH OPIOID ABUSE: President Donald J. Trump is dedicating his first public service campaign to combatting opioid misuse and addiction among youth.THE OPIOID CRISIS: The opioid epidemic in America is growing and young people are at an elevated risk of addiction.TAKING ACTION TO COMBAT OPIOIDS: President Trump and his Administration are committed to fighting opioid addiction across the Nation.
